affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{

	wait ( 300.000 );
	use ( "flare" );
	use ( "flare_ex" );
	use ( "flaredamage" );

	remove ( "wiretool" );
	use ( "flareguy01" );
	use ( "flareguy02" );
}
